author: coliver
msg: Added jx:eval tag which allows you to store a macro invocation in a variable and evaluate it later.

author: coliver
msg: Fixed variable scoping; added variables 'this' and 'cocoon.consumer' the former references the jexl context (in order to access illegal identifiers, e.g. this['woody-form']), the latter exposes the current XMLConsumer from the pipeline (experimental: I used this to implement woody wt: tags with jx macros); Supported expression subsitution in jx:set var attribute

author: vgritsenko
msg: Add support for Double and Float to this profane hack :-)
